featured.text: And 38 , Grants Pass has a lot of places to eat, ranging from a low-calorie dessert place to lovely restaurants, some of which o f f e r g o o d f o o d a n d g o r g e o u s v i e w s . 39 you can see, Grants Pass offers a lot to do in the summer.
Most men use more swear words, while far more women use adjectives such as “super” and “lovely,” and exclamations such as “Goodness me!” and “Oh dear!”
Jack: Oh, in a lovely valley, about three miles north of the National Park.
33 , there are lovely, clean campgrounds where campers can park their vehicles.

definition.en_def: Delightful or attractive in a way that brings pleasure.
definition.example: She wore a lovely dress to the party.
